resources.string: Values can explain our behavior and attitudes. One of the reasons why we may be satisfied with one employer but feel uncomfortable with another employer could be hidden within our values. Understanding our own personal values may help navigate professional development at a suitable company.

Companies differ by their corporate cultures which are usually conveyed by corporate values statements. Yet, the real sense of a corporate culture at a particular company may be captured through subjective personal feel. This perception we might get at informational/job interviews and while networking with professionals from a particular company
Brought to you by Career Changeover
As a guiding principle in my life, this value is...
As a business guiding principle for the company, this value is...

string-array.name: dimensionMotivationalGoals
string-array.item: Restraint of actions that could upset others or violate societal norms

Preservation and enhancement of the welfare of close people
Understanding, tolerance, appreciation and protection for the welfare of all people and nature
Personal success through demonstration of competence according to social standards
Attainment of prestige, control over people and resources
Safety, harmony and stability of the society, relationships and the self
